錟字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　錟； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1310第21
【唐韻】【集韻】?徒甘切，音談。【說文】長矛也。【揚子·方言】錟謂之鈹。　又【集韻】他甘切，音䑙。又疾染切，音漸。義?同。　又【集韻】思廉切，同銛。利也。【史記·秦始皇紀】非錟於句戟長鎩也。【註】錟，一作銛。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?以冉切，音琰。利刃也。【史記·蘇秦傳】錟戈在後。【註】錟，由冉反。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　锬; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1310 No. 21
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Disciple Ganqie, talk with voice. [Said the text] Spears too. 【Yangtze Dialect】It is called beryllium.　[Jiyun] He cuts happily, and Yinyue. And cut again, the sound gradually. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Think Lianqie, and the same. Lee also. 【Historical Records·Qin Shi Huang Ji】It is not a long scorpion. [Note] Chuan, one for the first.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Yi Ran cut, Yin Yan. Sharp edge also. 【Historical Records·Su Qin Biography】Hang Ge is behind. [Note] 锬, by Ran anti.
